metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2014:0714-1 -- Recommended update for open-iscsi
metadata.description:
This collective update for open-iscsi provides the following fixes:
* Init script now handles LVM stacked use of partitions. (bnc#867934) * Fix init script module load logic, removing bogus "FATAL ..." message when starting service. (bnc#867657) * Removed problematic check_for_node_onboot() in mkinitrd setup script. (bnc#834256) * Update mkinitrd open-iscsi setup script to handle both root and non-root iSCSI volumes, including iBFT. (bnc#834256, bnc#630434) * Correctly regenerate initrd after update. (bnc#831934)
